content:
@WG-triage we have had the meeting at the first wednesday of the month 16:00 UTC slot for a long time now. So I've created a new poll just to check in case there's a better time that fits the group:

https://doodle.com/poll/u757vzk5pkz3pfr6?utm_source=poll&utm_medium=link

June's meeting will continue at the original time (2021-06-02T18:00:00+02:00 ) and the new change (if any) will be from July onwards and will be announced at next meeting
@WG-triage just a reminder to kindly fill in this in case people prefer a different slot for the meetings
